pgrid.util.logging
Class FlushedStreamHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      java.util.logging.StreamHandler
          pgrid.util.logging.FlushedStreamHandler

public class FlushedStreamHandler
extends StreamHandler

This class extends the StreamHandler by flushing the stream after every published LogRecord.

Version:
1.0 2003/03/14
Author:
Roman Schmidt
See Also:
StreamHandler

          Create a FlushedStreamHandler, with no current output stream.

          Create a FlushedStreamHandler with a given Formatter and output stream.
